Package BankManagement

Class Bank

java.lang.Object
BankManagement.Bank
public class Bank extends Object
This class is composition of the Account class and the purpose is to create a type of database of the entries provided by the user
Since:
1.8
Version:
1.0
Author:
Karmandeep Singh
